overview: Surely no one ever could have imagined that Pastor Steven Anderson would visit Israel - least of all he himself! In this stunning visual tour-de-force, he and Pastor Roger Jimenez will be your tour guides through the holy land, bringing Bible stories to life as never before. "Beyond Jordan" lies the land of the patriarchs, the birthplace of our Lord Jesus Christ, and spiritual ground zero for the redemption of mankind.
title: Beyond Jordan
